itemDescription: novelist whose work has been made into films (1911-1992)

wikipedia_page.main: David Harry Walker  (9 February 1911 – 5 March 1992) was a Scottish-born Canadian novelist. He was born in Dundee, Scotland, later moving to St Andrews, New Brunswick, Canada, where he began his career as a writer. His work has been made into films.

link_mentions.page: Governor General's Award for English-language fiction
